name: Soshell Frustracean
description:
Note: use Spacebar to progress through the dialogue, only Windows build available

You may need to manually allow the file to run, this is under More Info>Run Anyway if the file is blocked

Life as a lobster in a world of hungry people can be really hard to navigate. Sometimes you need to trust your gut and sometimes you need to let in a friend! See if you can manage a day in this shell, and avoid reaching a boiling point with the people you meet.

A game by Lisa Miksch, Georgia Muller, Hikari Oishi, and Heather Wright

Created for Hot Jam 2021
